title: Vector Metadata
description: Additional metadata fields for vector data. Used when data_category is 'vector'.

feature_count.description: Number of features in the dataset

bbox.description: Bounding box as [minx, miny, maxx, maxy] in the envelope's CRS

total_area_m2.description: Sum of all feature areas in square meters. Useful for quick sanity checks.

id_field.description: Name of the attribute field that uniquely identifies features

attribute_fields.description: List of attribute field names present in the dataset
